verses.verse: Judge <WH8199> me<WH430>, O God, and plead<WH7378> my cause<WH7379> against an ungodly<WH3808> nation<WH1471>: Oh deliver<WH6403> me from the deceitful<WH4820> and unjust<WH5766> man<WH376>.
For thou art the God<WH430> of my strength<WH4581>; Why hast thou cast me off<WH2186>? Why go<WH1980> I mourning<WH6937> because of the oppression<WH3906> of the enemy<WH341>?
Oh send out<WH7971> thy light<WH216> and thy truth<WH571>; Let them lead<WH5148> me<WH935>: Let them bring me unto thy holy<WH6944> hill<WH2022>, And to thy tabernacles<WH4908>.
Then will I go<WH935> unto the altar<WH4196> of God<WH430>, Unto God<WH410> my exceeding<WH8057> joy<WH1524>; And upon the harp<WH3658> will I praise<WH3034> thee<WH430>, O God, my God<WH430>.

Why art thou cast down<WH7817>, O my soul<WH5315>? And why art thou disquieted<WH1993> within me<WH3176>? Hope thou in God<WH430>; For I shall yet praise<WH3034> him<WH3444>, Who is the help of my countenance<WH6440>, and my God<WH430>.
